properties.sql:
SELECT sp.Id as id/*, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco*/
FROM shkprocesses sp
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p ON p.id = sp.Id
JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
/*WHERE sps.KeyValue = 'open.running'
AND ssta.KeyValue = 'open.not_running.not_started'*/
